discussion.title: How to change function selection
discussion.body:
How to make hall of fame with  functions with the smallest loss?

By default, i guess, it selects functions with respect to score, as i always have a constant member.

nodes.body:
1. You can change the `model_selection` parameter: https://astroautomata.com/PySR/api/#the-objective
2. You can manually select based on your own metric. `predict`, `sympy`, `jax`, etc., all have an `index` parameter. Simply pass the row of the equation you want to use (you can compute this from `model.equations_`, which is the dataframe holding the equations). If `index` is `None` (default), then the `model_selection` strategy is used.
